    • setRobotSpeeds

      public void setRobotSpeeds(edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics.ChassisSpeeds chassisSpeeds)
      sets the robot's chassis speeds based on the given chassis speeds, enables isTurning
      Parameters:
      chassisSpeeds - the desired chassis speeds (+x forward, +y left, +omega counter-clockwise)

    • setRobotSpeeds

      public void setRobotSpeeds(edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics.ChassisSpeeds chassisSpeeds, boolean enableIsTurning)
      sets the robot's chassis speeds based on the given chassis speeds
      Parameters:
      chassisSpeeds - the desired chassis speeds (+x forward, +y left, +omega counter-clockwise)
      enableIsTurning - if true, the robot will not move if any pod is turning and will not start turning if any pod is still moving

    • getPods

      public ArrayList<DrivePod> getPods()

    • addVisionMeasurement

      public void addVisionMeasurement(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d visionPose, double timestamp, double distance)
      accepts a vision measurement for pose estimation
      Parameters:
      visionPose - estimated pose from the vision system
      distance - distance from the vision target to the robot, used for uncertainty in the pose estimation

    • resetPose

      public void resetPose(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d pose)
      sets pose to this
      Parameters:
      pose - estimated pose from the vision system
